import React from 'react'; import './scss/Blog.scss' import './scss/heart.scss' import Masonry from 'react-masonry-css' import { postArray } from './Array.jsx' import crown from './img/icons/crown.svg' export const Blog = () => { /*function cntLikes(i) { //document.querySelectorAll('span[class="likes"]')[i].outerText console.log(document.querySelectorAll('span[class="likes"]')[i].outerText) }*/ const breakpointColumnsObj = { default: 2, 1100: 1, 700: 1, 500: 1 }; return (
${postArray[0].author} ${postArray[0].dataCreated} ⋅ 1 min

${postArray[0].articleTitle}

${postArray[0].shortTxt}
${postArray[0].viewCnt} views 0 comments
${postArray[0].likeCnt}
) }
